# .NET WPF Data Transfer Application - Workspace Setup

## Project Overview
Converting PowerShell GUI Data Transfer Application to .NET 8 WPF application with improved architecture.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create .github directory and copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Get .NET WPF project setup information
- [ ] Create .NET 8 WPF project structure  
- [ ] Install NuGet packages
- [ ] Create project structure and folders
- [ ] Implement core models
- [ ] Implement services
- [ ] Create ViewModels with MVVM pattern
- [ ] Create XAML views
- [ ] Test and verify application
